# set kernels target
file(GLOB_RECURSE ASSEMBLE_LAST_TOKEN_SRCS *.cu)
list(FILTER ASSEMBLE_LAST_TOKEN_SRCS EXCLUDE REGEX ".*test.cu")
add_library(llm_kernels_nvidia_kernel_assemble_last_token STATIC ${ASSEMBLE_LAST_TOKEN_SRCS})
set_property(TARGET llm_kernels_nvidia_kernel_assemble_last_token PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_property(TARGET llm_kernels_nvidia_kernel_assemble_last_token PROPERTY CUDA_RESOLVE_DEVICE_SYMBOLS ON)
target_link_libraries(llm_kernels_nvidia_kernel_assemble_last_token PUBLIC -lcublas -lcudart -lcublasLt)

# for test
file(GLOB_RECURSE ASSEMBLE_LAST_TOKEN_TEST_SRCS *test.cu)
cc_test(llm_kernels_nvidia_kernel_assemble_last_token_test SRCS ${ASSEMBLE_LAST_TOKEN_TEST_SRCS} DEPS 
    llm_kernels_nvidia_utils
    llm_kernels_nvidia_kernel_assemble_last_token)
